DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test experimental drug combination two medication currently approve Food Drug Administration ( FDA ) migraine headache pain . These call rizatriptan give acetaminophen .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Rizatriptan Co-Administered With Acetaminophen Treatment Acute Migraine
